title: Paper Mario: The Thousand Year Door confession
body:
I legitimately had the hardest fucking time trying to make some potion to turn Peach invisible or something when the game was on Peach's little side story, so much so that I was sure I was never going to beat the game because I couldn't get past it.

I have no idea how I managed to finally figure it out, but I did. 


P.S. PPTTYD is probably the most nostalgic game ever made.
